title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 13.6 - Approved secondary course
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 13.6 - Approved secondary course

State Regulations

Four years of secondary work based upon eight years of
elementary work or the equivalent, shall be required for the approval of a
secondary course presented for credit toward a qualifying
certificate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
13.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
